KeysToEntries.Endurance.Desc: A measure of how well rested you are. As you get more tired your stamina, carrying capacity and even your spellcasting will suffer.
KeysToEntries.Endurance.Title: Rest
KeysToEntries.Sustenance.Desc: Sustenance affects health regeneration. The higher it is, the better your health regenerates.
KeysToEntries.Sustenance.Title: Sustenance
KeysToEntries.Hydration.Desc: Hydration affects stamina regeneration. The higher it is, the better your stamina recovers.
KeysToEntries.Hydration.Title: Hydration
